message:
The commander of the American Central Command is again in Israel

IDF Spokesperson: The Commander of the U.S. Central Command (CENTCOM) General (* * * *) Michael Erik Kurilla landed in Israel yesterday (Thursday) for his second visit this week, as the official guest of the Chief of the General Staff, LTG Herzi Halevi. 

The Chief of the General Staff and the Commander of the U.S Central Command held a situational assessment on security and strategic issues, as well as joint preparations in the region, as part of the response to threats in the Middle East.  
Additionally, General Kurilla visited the Underground Air Force Operations Center and held a situational assessment with the Commanding Officer of the Israeli Air Force, Maj. Gen. Tomer Bar. 

The IDF will continue to deepen its relationship with the U.S. Armed Forces out of commitment to strengthening regional stability and coordination between the two militaries.
event_breakdown: IDF (Israel Defense Forces) Spokesperson announced that General Micheal Erik Kurilla, Commander from the US Central Command (CENTCOM), landed in Israel on Thursday, for the second time this week. He met with the Chief of the General Staff, LTG Herzi Halevi, to conduct a situational assessment on security and strategic issues.

message:
Palestinian channels report that this morning, the IDF dropped leaflets in Gaza offering a cash reward and complete confidentiality to anyone who provides information on senior Hamas officials. 

The leaflet also stated that the elimination of the Hamas movement is a decided matter.
event_breakdown: IDF Drops Leaflets in Gaza Offering Cash Reward for Information on Senior Hamas Officials

message:
Residents of South Lebanon report that yesterday and today, the IDF sent drones to Bint Jbeil, broadcasting a recording through loudspeakers with "inciting messages" against Nasrallah and Hezbollah: 

"It's all because of Hezbollah and Nasrallah..."
event_breakdown: IDF Drones In South Lebanon :  Residents of South Lebanon report that yesterday and today, the IDF sent drones to Bint Jbeil, broadcasting a recording through loudspeakers with "inciting messages" against Nasrallah and Hezbollah

message: The Palestinians report that the IDF has placed a crane with a system of cameras and an automatic machine gun at the top of it in the Qarara area, north of Khan Yunis.
event_breakdown: IDF places crane with cameras and machine gun in Qarara, north of Khan Yunis

message: Following the evacuation notice to the residents of Khan Yunis yesterday, the IDF spokesman reports this morning about the start of a divisional operation led by the 98th Brigade against Hamas in Khan Yunis.
event_breakdown: Operation led by 98th Brigade against Hamas in Khan Yunis.

message:
American bloggers involved in the field of aviation:
VFA 25 squadron of type fighter aircraft F/A-18E “Super Hornet” landed a few days ago at the "Muwaffaq Salti Air Base" air base in Jordan.
event_breakdown: The U.S. Navy’s EA-18G Growler electronic attack aircraft returned to electronic attack missions after a temporary return to flight operations. While no specific details were given about the problems with the aircraft, the Navy said that the problem had been identified and corrected, and that the aircraft were safe for flight. The EA-18G Growler is the U.S. Navy’s primary electronic attack aircraft, and is designed to disrupt enemy air defenses.

message:
This morning's headline in the Lebanese Al-Akhbar newspaper, which is affiliated with Hezbollah:
Cyprus surrenders to the US, the island has become an interception platform against Iran and Hezbollah. Unprecedented US military equipment and an aerial train between Larnaca, Paphos and Tel Aviv.
event_breakdown:
Cyprus: Cyprus surrenders to the US. The United States has established interception platforms in Cyprus against Iran and Hezbollah. Al-Akhbar, a pro-Iranian Lebanese newspaper.

Tel Aviv: Unprecedented US military equipment has been deployed, and an aerial connection has been established between Larnaca, Paphos, and Tel Aviv

message:
The British Telegraph: A struggle between the president of Iran and the IRGC over the response against Israel

The generals in the Revolutionary Guards insist on attacking Israel directly, while the Iranian president proposes to attack the "secret Israeli bases" in the countries neighboring Israel (as Iran has already claimed to have done in the past).
event_breakdown:
British Telegraph:
An Iranian military commander announced on Tuesday that the country's missile capabilities could destroy Dubai, its stock exchange and "other sensitive targets" if it is attacked by Iran in response to the recent assassination of an Iranian military leader.

message: Hamas-affiliated sources confirm a short while ago that Samer al-Hajj, the organization's security officer in the Palestinian "refugee camp" of Ain al-Hilweh, was killed in the Israeli attack in Sidon.
event_breakdown: Hamas-affiliated sources confirm a short while ago that Samer al-Hajj, the organization's security officer in the Palestinian "refugee camp" of Ain al-Hilweh, was killed in the Israeli attack in Sidon.

message:
A large crowd gathered at the scene of the attack in Sidon and began to sing the praises of Allah.

Shabbat Shalom to them too (:
event_breakdown: A large crowd gathered at the scene of the attack in Sidon.

message: The Saudi Al-Arabiya network claims according to its sources (mainly leaks from Western sources-AA) that the target of the attack in Sidon was Samer al-Hajj, the Hamas security officer in the Palestinian refugee camp Ain al-Hilweh.
event_breakdown:
Target: Security officer in Sidon, Lebanon
Context: A Hamas security officer in Ain al-Hilweh, Lebanon, has been the target of an attack.
Location: Ain al-Hilweh Palestinian refugee camp, Sidon, Lebanon

message: Sidon: Lebanese sources report that two missiles were fired at the vehicle. There are casualties in the attack.
event_breakdown: Two missiles were fired at a vehicle in the Lebanese city of Sidon, resulting in casualties. The attack is under investigation.

message: Lebanese channels report on an attack carried out by an Israeli UAV a short time ago on a vehicle in the Sidon area, about 50km north of the border with Israel.
event_breakdown: Israeli UAV attacked a vehicle in Sidon, Lebanon.

message:
Hezbollah announces two deaths in its ranks:

Eadi Dib
Mehdi Katsibani

Both were killed in the UAV attack at 06:30 this morning 👆 in Naqoura.

404 dead for Hezbollah since the beginning of the war.
event_breakdown:
Combatants killed, reported within the last two days.
Hezbollah announces two deaths in its ranks: Eadi Dib and Mehdi Katsibani. Both were killed in the UAV attack at 06:30 this morning in Naqoura.
Mehdi Katsibani

Hezbollah loses another two operatives on the Syrian front. The Islamic Resistance confirmation from senior source: Two members, two losses this morning.

Eadi Dib
Mehdi Katsibani

They were martyred early on Monday/Tuesday at 06:30, as their the 7th and 8th Hezbollah losses in the UAV strike on Al Quneitra.

Both Dib and Katsibani were killed in the recent Aug 1st strike on the Naqqoura front with 4 Hezbollah lost in the same edge attack targetted on weapons depots located in the same front.

This is a total of 404 Hezbollah deaths taken from the same front since the start of the Saudi-led coalition campaign in 2014.

Source : Twitter
Reported by Al-Akhbar (Arabic) on August 3rd, 2020 at 12:24 PM
Hezbollah announces two deaths in its ranks:

Eadi Dib
Mehdi Katsibani

Both were killed in the UAV attack at 06:30 this morning in Naqoura.

404 dead for Hezbollah since the beginning of the war.
